bioconda.name: conterminator
bioconda.summary: Conterminator: software to detect contamination in large sequence sets

biocontainers.name: conterminator
biocontainers.summary: Conterminator: software to detect contamination in large sequence sets

biotools.summary: Conterminator is an efficient method to detect incorrectly labeled sequences across kingdoms by an exhaustive all-against-all sequence comparison. It is free open-source GPLv3-licensed software for Linux and macOS.

bioschemas.name: Conterminator
bioschemas.summary: Conterminator is an efficient method to detect incorrectly labeled sequences across kingdoms by an exhaustive all-against-all sequence comparison. It is free open-source GPLv3-licensed software for Linux and macOS.
